assigning to planner codes Assign Items to Planner Code by Class Code
section.para: To assign items to a planner code by class code, select the Assign Items to Planner Code by Class Code option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Assign Items to Planner Code by Class Code

section.para: When assigning items to a planner code by class code, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to assign all class codes to a planner code.
Specify class code you want to assign to a planner code.
Enter a class code pattern to select a range of class codes. Refine your search using regular expressions.
Select to assign items to a planner code by class code for all sites.
Specify site whose items by class code you want to assign to a planner code.
Specify the planner code you want to assign the class code(s) to.
